text:
My new favorite nursery in all of Singapore. What a cool home-based business. Julius and his mom are the most hospitable of hosts; they are so patient in showing you around and are knowledgeable — and passionate! — about every pot they they grow. The prices are reasonable AND they take CDC coupons. Thanks, SG government, for lifting up your small businesses.

(Ask Julius’s mom about the white tea grown at their family farm too — it’s superb.)
Meet julius for long time and very friendly person.Easy to deal and his mom also very helpful and friendly too.
Had a great time looking at Orchids here! Prices are always reasonable and there's always a large variety to explore. Will definitely come back again.

Started buying orchids from Julius since Circuit Breaker as the prices are reasonable and of very good quality. He's always there if there's any questions regarding the plants. Highly recommended for those who are looking for plants to start or grow their collection.
Specialised orchid nursery with other interesting plants. Passionate and helpful owners who are very knowledgeable.
